channel.title: Python on Joseph Courtney
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Joseph Courtney

item.title: FastAPI Kubernetes infratructure with Terraform deployment
item.description: The backend of this project is written in Python using the FastAPI framework and runs on the official python:3.10.7-slim-bullseye Docker image. The frontend of my project is written in JavaScript using the React JS and Tailwind CSS frameworks.

item.title: Crayon CloudIQ SDK for Python
item.description: This project is an SDK for Crayon’s CloudIQ API that can be used in Python scripts and applications. Provides a simple interface for individuals who are inexperienced in C# to test Cloud IQ API calls with Python.
